description: net/http: Correcting a minor problem in the http documentation. It references url.URL.RawPath, but RawPath is gone in tip. Using simply Path.

messages.text: Hmm.. have you signed the agreement?

net/http: fix reference to URL.RawPath in docs

CC=golang-dev

Committer: Gustavo Niemeyer <gustavo@niemeyer.net>

On 2012/02/10 19:52:47, bjorn.tipling wrote:
> On 2012/02/10 19:28:17, niemeyer wrote:
> > Hmm.. have you signed the agreement?
> 
> Yes, I signed the agreement electronically yesterday.

I will run the hg mail command as soon as I can. Sorry about missing that part.

On 2012/02/10 19:28:17, niemeyer wrote:
> Hmm.. have you signed the agreement?

Yes, I signed the agreement electronically yesterday.

>> Yes, I signed the agreement electronically yesterday.
>
> I will run the hg mail command as soon as I can. Sorry about missing
> that part.

No worries.. hg mail will just ask people to review your change when
you have it ready the first time or when you've performed a
modification and want a re-review. No need to do that right now.
